ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] AA question
ygData.msgSnippet: Really depends on how fast you want to advance in lvl. If you re in consistent, good xp groups the aa s should come quickly, and they may be helpful to get
ygData.messageBody:
Really depends on how fast you want to advance in lvl.
If you're in consistent, good xp groups the aa's
should come quickly, and they may be helpful to get
along the way, run speed 3 can be especially handy for
dungeon crawling at any lvl. It really just depends
on how quickly you feel that you want to progress
through actual lvls though.

--- Mushu <mushuplus@...> wrote:

> i have a 51 ENC and i wasn't sure if i should start
> my AAs until about
> lvl 59 because i am working on Project Illusion
> which makes it so i
> can cast my illusion upon others
>
>
>
